D√©veloppeur depuis plus de 8 ans maintenant, j‚Äôai principalement fait mes armes dans des agences de communication en France et au Luxembourg.

J‚Äôai d√©but√© ma carri√®re en d√©veloppant des sites web pour des clients de toutes tailles en leur proposant des solutions WordPress et Drupal. Longtemps soucieux de ma√Ætriser tous les aspects du m√©tier, je suis √† l‚Äôaise aussi bien en back-end (PHP) qu‚Äôen front-end (JavaScript, CSS/Sass).

Toutefois, j‚Äôai r√©cemment fait le pari de me focaliser sur l‚Äôaspect front-end tout en me sp√©cialisant dans la ma√Ætrise de React JS. Et bient√¥t, j‚Äôaurai √† coeur d‚Äôutiliser Node JS pour le back-end (sans rancune PHP üíô).
body.en:
Developer for more than 8 years now, I mainly worked in communication agencies in France and Luxembourg.

I started my career by developing websites for clients of all sizes with WordPress and Drupal solutions. For a long time, I have been trying to perform all the aspects of the job. I am comfortable with both back-end (PHP) and front-end (JavaScript, CSS/Sass) parts.

However, I recently decided to focus on the front-end aspect while specializing in React JS. And soon, I'd like to use Node JS for the back-end (no hard feelings PHP üíô).

body.en: Pierre is a passionate and invested developer. Specialized front-end developer (JavaScript, Sass, Webpack, Gulp, NodeJS etc.) he also has a perfect mastery of Drupal/WordPress CMS for the backend part, CMS on which we worked together daily. Humble and smiling, it's hard to see such a good teammate leave :)
